inclusion.criterion: on chronic red cell transfusion therapy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: outpatient at the time of transfusion
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of reactions to transfusion therapy that cannot be adequately managed by antihistamines
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: participation in another therapeutic trial for SCD
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: uncontrolled inter-current illness, or psychiatric illness/social situations that would limit compliance with study requirements.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a known history of sickle cell disease and is experiencing severe bone pain. He has had positive history of sickle cell crises since childhood.
